Returns: true If the text currently in the text editor is valid.
A string based on invalidText such as invoking isValid() on it returns true.
Parameters: CharSequence: A string that doesn't pass validation: isValid(invalidText) returns false
fixText(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Corrects the specified text to make it valid.

ClassDesc: This interface is used to make sure that the text entered in this TextView complies to a certain format. Since there is no foolproof way to prevent the user from leaving this View with an incorrect value in it, all we can do is try to fix it ourselves when this happens.
